name: Frost Brand
description: This dark iron bastard sword is cool to the touch. It freezes the surrounding air when drawn.
additional: You can cast Chilling Touch once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Steadfast
description: This single-edged blade has a recurved guard in the shape of opposing waves, the guard and base of the blade are stained a brillant blue.
additional: You have advantage on wisdom saving throws against mental affects.

name: Gorum's Labor
description: Cruedly spiked and covered in blood, this ironwood club was the weapon of a heroic barbarian whos name was lost to time.

name: Shattered Vengence
description: Rumored to have been crafted in Andoran, the club is stained from the blood of the ruling elite.
benefit: Deals an additional 1d6 damage to humans and elves.

name: Twin Sting
description: An unusually designed crossbow, full of complex mechanisms allowing the wielder to shoot twice.
benefit: Shoots two bolts, can target two different creatures or the same.

name: Good Friend
description: This crossbow was the prized possession of a pair of thieves that tormented the nobility throughout eastern Ustlav.
benefit: Attack rolls increased by 1 if attacking the same creature as an ally.

name: Drawn in Spring
description: Named for the spring time cool breeze, this silver dagger is as sharp as it is cool to the touch.

name: Misery's End
description: It's said this blade could slip so easily and effectively into a sleeping man's spine that he would stumble into a new life none the wiser.
benefit: Attack rolls against prone and stunned creatures gain advantage.

name: Edge of Reason
description: A dark iron greataxe that weighs twice that of other greataxes. Distortions appear around the wielder when drawn.
benefit: Critical hits casts Disguise Self on you (automatically).
additional: You can cast Color Spray once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Hearth Harvest
description: This silver greataxe feel warm to the tough, weilding it grants the warmth of a blazing hearth.

name: The Grey Sleeper
description: The groans of a dozen tortured souls ring from the metal, this blade's gives off an unsettling presense.
benefit: Critical hits slow target for 3 rounds.

name: The Temaperacl
description: The edges of this blade are constantly coated in acid, this not only deals additional damage but keeps the blade extremely sharp.
additional: Attack rolls crit on a 19 or better.

name: Tall Grass
description: Named for its strange shape and color, Tall Grass is a powerful tool for those who defend nature.
benefit: Critical hits entangle target for 3 rounds.
additional: When wielded by a neutral character it returns when thrown.

name: Wicked Beast
description: The soul of a rampaging werewolf is said to inhabit this wickedly spiked javelin, when thrown it's said you can hear howls if you listen carefully.

name: Borresaine
description: Crafted from the bones of a slain wolf, the mere existance of this bow infuriates wolves and werewolves a like.
benefit: Critical hits stun target for 1 round.

name: Veilpiercer
description: This weapon is suffused with energies enabling the wielder to stand his ground against incorporeal creatures of all kinds.
benefit: Deals an additional 1d6 damage to incorporeal creatures.

name: Flame Tongue
description: A silver longsword that radiates a dull, comforting heat. It errupts into flames when drawn.
additional: You can cast Burning Hands once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Hell's Beckoning
description: This sword produces a sharp, acrid odor when drawn and cuts through both flesh and incorporeal creatures alike.
additional: Deals an additional 1d6 damage to incorporeal creatures.

name: Ravenwing
description: The mace is finely wrought and lightweight, making it maneuverable as if it where a raven in flight when swung.

name: Frostfall
description: The frosted-over steel contains a small portion of a linnorm's soul, imparting upon the weapon a cold, aching hunger that can never be sated.
additional: Deals 1 cold damage each round to all enemies within close.

name: Stormcaller
description: This pearl white wooden bow radiates energy. The air crackles with electricity when drawn.
additional: You can cast Shocking Grasp once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Prey Maker
description: Fangs, claws, teeth and bones can be seen interlocking throughout the weapon's blood stained structure.

name: Resolution
description: This adamantine blade was forged into a weapon that struck hard and true, woe to those who seek to supress the masses.
additional: Attack rolls crit on a 19 or better.

name: Seeker's Fang
description: Sleek yet thorned, jagged and impossibly sharp, it's difficult to tell whether this blade is forged of some exotic metal or a dragon's tooth.

name: The Vile Loner's Lance
description: This weapon inspire awe on the battlefield, while it appears to be simple spear it has devastating power at its tip.
benefit: Critical hits reduce target's AC by 4 for 3 rounds.

name: Stalker's Patience
description: The barbed spearhead grants prey a swift end, fitting as it's likly they won't hear or see the wielder coming.

name: The Spine of Thicket Green
description: This gnarled staff is heavy, owed to an entwined length of amber running down its core.
additional: You can cast Thorn Whip, Barkskin, and Burst of Nettles once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Warding Staff
description: Deceptively simple, this staff is an extremely powerful defensive bastion for those who know how to wield it.
additional: You can cast Mage Armor, Mirror Image, and Magic Circle once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Shatterstar
description: This awe inspiring weapon was fashioned from stones that fall from the heavens.
benefit: Deals an additional 1d4 cold and electical damage.

name: Strike Hard
description: Made from solid skymetal, this hammer is capable of dealing massive concussive damage to foes.
